message.body: Have u already told Jason? I don't want to overdo it. <!3
I'm not announcing it right now so I haven't told anyone
Don't know y that y was in his mouth. Mayhaps it stands for yyyyyeeeeeeaaaayyyyyyyyy!

1 mile on treadmill <28 min. Upped pace from 2.4 to 3.0 over time. HR max 145. Broke major sweat with tall fan 8 ft. away. One tiptoe for humankind. One giant leap for me. I, nevertheless, willingly concede Coup de Foudre of the Day to Za.
